title: YouTube : all-time beauty content category views 2017
yAxis: Amount of category views in billions
summary: This statistic shows the share of consumers agreeing with statements regarding their habits while shopping , according to a survey conducted with uk consumers in 2016 . Of respondents , over 81 percent stated that they look at products in store but subsequently go online to find the best price , and nearly 52 percent tended to use the same retailers on a regular basis . The most popular day for browsing online and doing shopping is shown to be Sunday , where as the least popular day is Friday .
gold: This statistic presents the content views of selected beauty-related categories on YouTube as of July 2017 . As of that month , cosmetics content had generated 156 billion views on the video platform . Hair content had generated 87 billion video views .
